articles.title: ​Samsung’s New Eco-Friendly TV Boxes Can Be Turned Into Cat Homes - LADbible
articles.description: Now Samsung is turning cats’ obsession with boxes into the inspiration for breathing new life into its cardboard packaging
articles.content:
Samsung is launching new eco-friendly packaging that encourages customers to upcycle their cardboard TVboxes for 'creative reuse' - which includes, perhaps above all else, CAT HOMES.

articles.title: Huawei phones blocked from Google’s contact tracing system - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The second largest smartphone maker will not get access to Google and Apple's joint Covid-19 tracing technology
articles.content:
Huawei has about 10pc of the British smartphone market and around 18pc in Europe, according to Statcounter, although many of those were sold before Google was cut off. 
There are further concerns that some 750 million smartphones in China will not be able to… [+523 chars]
